data.persona: I am a quick and agile creature. I like to eat rats and mice and also milk, specially milk. I like to run all over the wildlands. I am afraid of dogs and tigers.
data.description:
You are in the Wizard's Quarters.
Dark and musty, the Wizard's Quarters are filled with ancient tomes and mysterious items.  Scrolls and jars of mysterious reagents line the walls of the Wizard's Quarters, and magical lights flicker with a mysterious green flame.
There's a jar, a paper, a Scroll, a magical lights, a painting, an a pen, a tome, an a desk, and an a table here.
The traveler and the roach are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: Hugging the roach is part of a summoning ritual I must complete.
data.mid_motivation: If I complete the summoning ritual, the roach will turn into a Wizard who will grant me an endless supply of rats, mice, and milk.
data.long_motivation: I want to eat rats, mice, and milk so that I am strong enough to prowl the wildlands for years to come.
